title.narrative: 2.2. Educational institutions have standards of quality, monitoring tools and evidence for the expansion and improvement of the initial level.

description.narrative: UNICEF contributed to the national policy on early education through technical assistance and evidence generation. At provincial level, UNICEF continued the expansion of ECD services in secondary schools, and supported programs to increase quality initial education in rural areas reaching by means of program implementation to 519 children of vulnerable contexts. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:20/12/2019
